comment.author: 33003595@N07
comment._content:
A mistake here: this airplane was built by John J Montijo & Lloyd Royer, Glendale CA in 1924 in the Kinner building...right next door to Mort Bach's place.

Though it looks like a Bach, sorta, it isn't.

Rob Bach

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: Thank you!  So what is the official designation?
